anya-e0301n1:1_1: Abhidhammatthasaṅgahaṁ kattukāmo anuruddhatthero saṅgahārabbhe tāva sappayojane pañcapiṇḍatthe dassento ādigātha māha.
anya-e0301n1:1_8: Sā sammāsambuddhamatulaṁ sasaddhammagaṇuttamaṁ abhivādiyāti etehi padehi dassitā.
anya-e0301n1:1_9: Sakalena ganthena abhihitā padhānatthabhūtā cattāro abhidhammatthā ganthābhidheyyo.
anya-e0301n1:3_0: Saṅgahitabhāvopi abhidheyyoyevāti katvā abhidheyyo abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadena dassitotivuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:4_0: Na hi so appadhānatthabhūto saṅgahitabhāvo imasmiṁ piṇḍatthadassane abhidheyyo nāma bhavituṁ yuttoti.
anya-e0301n1:4_1: Ito paṭṭhāyaca ṭīkāyanti vutte imassa saṅgahassa dvīsu sīhaḷaṭīkāsu pathamāṭīkā daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n1:7_3: Saṅgahaganthe kate sati taduggahaparipucchādivasena anāyāsato laddhabbaṁ dhammānaṁ sarūpāvabodhādikaṁ
anya-e0301n1:7_4: anupādāparinibbānantaṁ ganthassa phalānuphalaṁ ganthappayojanaṁ taṁpi abhidhammatthasaṅgahapadeneva sāmatthiyato dassitaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:10_0: Na hi abhidhammatthasaddena vinā anāyāsato saṁsiddhimattadīpakena saṅgahasaddamattena tādiso anupādāparinibbānanto payo janaviseso sakkā viññātuṁ,
anya-e0301n1:11_0: 2. Tattha ratanattayavandanā tāva asaṅkheyyaappameyyappayojanā hoti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:12_0: Te tādise pūjayato, nibbute akuto bhaye;
anya-e0301n1:13_0: Na sakkā puññaṁ saṅkhātuṁ, yamettha mapi kenacīti.
anya-e0301n1:14_0: Ya metthamapītiettha yenakenaci api manussenavā devenavā brahmunāvā saṅkhātuṁ na sakkāti yojanā.
anya-e0301n1:14_1: Ṭīkākārāpi taṁ payojanaṁ tattha tattha bahudhā papañcenti.
anya-e0301n1:19_2: Vuccate-ratanattayavandanā hi nāma vandanākiriyābhinipphādako sattakkhattuṁ sattakkhattuṁ anekakoṭisatasahassavāre
anya-e0301n1:19_4: So ca anuttaresu buddhādīsu puññakkhettesu saṁvaḍḍhitattā therassa ca uḷāracchandasaddhābuddhiguṇehi
anya-e0301n1:19_5: paribhāvitattā mahājutiko mahapphalo mahānisaṁso ca puññātisayo hoti.
anya-e0301n1:19_6: So sayaṁ payogasampattibhāve ṭhatvā bahiddhā vipattipaccaye apanetvā sampattipaccaye upanetvā atipaṇītautucittāhāra
anya-e0301n1:19_7: samuṭṭhitānaṁ sarīraṭṭhakadhātūnaṁ upabrūhanaṁ katvā paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya laddho kāsassa janakakammassa
anya-e0301n1:19_10: Atha laddhānubalena laddho kāsena ca tadubhayena puññena nibbattā rūpārūpasantatiyo therasantāne yamakamahānadiyo
anya-e0301n1:19_12: Tadā tasmiṁ iṭṭhaphalaghanaparipūrite therasantāne aniṭṭhaphalabhūtānaṁ rogādi antarāyānaṁ uppattiyā
anya-e0301n1:19_13: okāso nāma natthīti iṭṭhaphalasantānavibādhakāni aniṭṭhaphalasantānajanakāni ca apuññakammāni dūrato
anya-e0301n1:19_15: Na hi kammānināma puññāni apuññāni ca attano vipākuppattiyā okāse asati vipaccantīti.
anya-e0301n1:19_16: Tato tasmiṁ santāne āyuvaṇṇā dayo iṭṭhaphaladhammā yāva ganthaniṭṭhānā yāva āyukappapariyo sānāpi vā vaḍḍhanapakkhe ṭhatvā pavattanti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:21_0: Cattāro dhammā vaḍḍhanti, āyuvaṇṇo sukhaṁ balanti.
anya-e0301n1:22_1: Tasmā saṅgahārabbhe ratanattayavandanākaraṇaṁ therassa attanā ārabbha mānasaṅgahassa anantarāyena parisamāpanutthaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:22_3: sotūnañca saṅgahaṁ gaṇhantānaṁ ādimhiyeva ratanattaya vandanā siddhito anantarāyena gahaṇa kiccasampajjanatthanti.
anya-e0301n1:24_0: Sattasu javanesu pathamajavana vaseneva vandanā payojanaṁ vibhāvitaṁ viya dissati.
anya-e0301n1:25_2: Yathā hi āhārarūpassa dvīsu kiccesu ojaṭṭhamakarūpajananakiccaṁ parittakaṁ appamattakaṁ hoti.
anya-e0301n1:25_4: Tathāhi paṭṭhānepi tadupatthambhanakiccameva gahetvā kabaḷīkāro āhāro imassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayoti vibhaṅgavāro vibhatto.
anya-e0301n1:25_5: Evamevaṁ idhapi pathamajavanassa avunāva vipākajananakiccaṁ parittakaṁ appamattakaṁ hoti.
anya-e0301n1:25_9: Yasmā pana ganthābhidheyye ganthappakāre ganthappayojane ca ādito vivitesati sotu janānaṁ ganthassavane ussāho jāyati.
anya-e0301n1:25_10: Tasmā tesaṁ ganthā bhidheyyādīnaṁ dassanaṁ ganthe ussāhajananatthaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_2: Sammāca bujjhi sāmañca bujjhīti sammā sambuddho.
anya-e0301n1:26_4: So bujjhitabbesu ñeyyadhammesu bujjhanakriyāya asesabyāvibhāvaṁ dīpeti.
anya-e0301n1:26_5: Tathāhi padesañāṇe ṭhitā paccekabuddhādayo attano visaye eva aviparītaṁ bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n1:26_6: Avisaye pana andhakāre paviṭṭhāviya hontīti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_7: Visayo ca tesaṁ appamattakova sabbaññuvisayaṁ upādāya yathā hattha puṭe ākāso appamattakova ajaṭākāsaṁ upādāyāti.
anya-e0301n1:26_8: Te hi phassādīsu dhammesu ekadhammampi sabbākārato bujjhituṁ nasakkontīti.
anya-e0301n1:26_11: Te hi anamatagge saṁsāre anantāsu ca lokadhātūsu tiyaddhagate addhamuttake ca dhamme hatthamaṇike viya samasame katvā bujjhanti.
anya-e0301n1:26_12: Sabbe dhammā sabbākārena buddhassa bhagavato ñāṇamukhe āpāta māgacchantīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_14: Tattha hi te dhammā bodhimaṇḍe sabbaṁ abhidhammaṁ sammasanato paṭṭhāya niccakālaṁ upaṭṭhahantīti.
anya-e0301n1:26_15: Sabbaññubuddhā pana yattake dhamme vicāretuṁ icchanti.
anya-e0301n1:26_16: Tattake dhamme āvajjanāya visuṁ katvā āvajjitvā vicārentīti.
anya-e0301n1:26_17: Nanu dhammā mahantā bhavaṅgaṁ parittakanti na codetabbametaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_19: Saṁsaddo pana sāmanti etassa atthe upasaggo.
anya-e0301n1:26_21: Na me ācariyo atthīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_22: Nanu bhagavato tatīyacatutthāruppa samāpattiyo āḷārudakamūlikāti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:26_23: Tā pana analaṅkaritvā laddhamattāva hutvā chaḍḍitattā pacchā bujjhanakriyāya pādakamattāpi nahonti.
anya-e0301n1:26_25: Tasmā tā bhagavato buddhabhāve sācariyakataṁ na sādhentīti.
anya-e0301n1:27_1: Idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu sāmaṁ saccāni abhisambujjhi.
anya-e0301n1:29_1: Idāni thero attano vandanaṁ suṭṭhubalavaṁ karonto atulanti āha.
anya-e0301n1:29_2: Anekaguṇapadavisayā hi vandanā suṭṭhutaraṁ balavatī hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:29_3: Nanu ekaguṇapadavisayāpi vandanā antarā yanīvāraṇesamatthā siyāti kiṁ dutīyenāti.
anya-e0301n1:29_5: Viññujātikā pana satthuguṇatthomane mattakārino nāma na honti .
anya-e0301n1:29_9: Na kevalaṁ antarā yanīvāraṇameva vandanāya icchitabbaṁ hoti.
anya-e0301n1:29_11: Sopi hi anāyāsena gantha niṭṭhānassa ganthapārisuddhiyā ca paccayo hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:29_13: Citta samādhāne ca sati paññātikkhāsūrā hutvā pahati.
anya-e0301n1:29_14: Samāhito bhikkhave yathābhūtaṁ pajānātīti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:29_15: Tasmā tadatthāyapi attano vandanā suṭṭhu balavatī kātabbāyevāti.
anya-e0301n1:31_0: ‘‘Yathāvuttavacanattha yogepi sammāsambuddhasaddassa bhagavati samaññāvasena pavattattā atulanti iminā vise setī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:32_2: Tasmā taṁ sabhāvaniruttiṁ jānantānaṁsantike bhāvatthasuññaṁ satthusamaññāmattaṁ bhavituṁ nārahati.
anya-e0301n1:32_3: Aññesaṁ pana padasahassaṁ vuccamānaṁpi satthu samaññāmattameva sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n1:32_6: natthitulo sadiso etassāti vā atulo. Bhagavā.
anya-e0301n1:32_7: Na hi atthi bhagavato attanā sadiso koci lokasminti. Yathāha –
anya-e0301n1:33_0: Na me ācariyo atthi, sadiso me na vijjati;
anya-e0301n1:35_3: Tadā hi mahāpuriso sampatijātova samāno puratthimadisābhimukho aṭṭhāsi.
anya-e0301n1:35_4: Tasmiṁ disā bhāge anantāni cakkavāḷāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṁ.
anya-e0301n1:35_5: Tesu ṭhitā devabrahmāno mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadiso natthi.
anya-e0301n1:35_8: Tadā mahāpuriso attano sabbalokaggabhāvaṁ ñatvā aggohamasmi lokassa,
anya-e0301n1:35_11: natthi dāni punabbhavoti evaṁ achambhivācaṁ nicchāresīti.
anya-e0301n1:35_14: Yadā pana so sumedhabhūto dīpaṅkarabuddhassa santike niyatabyākaraṇaṁ gaṇhi.
anya-e0301n1:35_15: Tadāpi thapetvā dīpaṅkarasammāsambuddhaṁ pāramitāguṇehi tena sadiso koci nattheva.
anya-e0301n1:35_16: Natthibhāvocassa tadā pavatte hi dasasahassilokadhātukampanādīhi asādhāraṇapāṭihāriyehi dīpetabbo.
anya-e0301n1:35_17: Tāni hi paccekabodhisattānaṁ satasahassaṁpi pavattetuṁ na sakkhissatiyeva.
anya-e0301n1:35_19: Teneva hi tadā pavattipāramipavicayaññāṇaṁ attano visaye sabbaññuthaññāṇagatikanti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:35_20: Sāvakabodhisattāpi hi yato paṭṭhāya attano bodhiyā anurūpe sambhāradhamme sayameva jānituṁ sakkonti.
anya-e0301n1:35_21: Tato paṭṭhāya anivattidhammā hutvā vattānusārimahāputhujjanabhāvaṁ atikkamitvā bodhisattabhūmiṁ okkantā honti.
anya-e0301n1:35_22: Ekena pariyāyena niyatā sambodhiparāyanā ca nāma honti.
anya-e0301n1:35_23: Tadā eva buddhānaṁ sammukhibhāve sati niyatabyākaraṇaṁ labhanti.
anya-e0301n1:37_0: Samitatthe yyakārassa akārassa vā vasena etaṁ siddhanti vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:38_0: Na hi tulasaddo dhātusiddho kammasādhano ca bhavituṁ na yutto.
anya-e0301n1:38_4: Evañca sati kammasādhaneneva tadatthasiddhito kiṁ tato samitatthe yyakārassaakārassa vā cintāyāti.
anya-e0301n1:38_5: Vatticchānugato saddappayogoti katvā etaṁ vuttanti ce. Na.
anya-e0301n1:38_6: Yathā sutaṁ yuttaṁ vajjetvā assutassa parikappanāya payo janābhāvatoti.
anya-e0301n1:39_1: Imehi pana dvīhi padehi satthu tisso sampadā vibhā vitā honti.
anya-e0301n1:39_3: Tattha satthu mahākaruṇā samaṅgitā bodhisambhārasambharaṇañca hetusampadānāma.
anya-e0301n1:39_4: Bodhimaṇḍe pavattitā catuvīsati koṭisabhasahassasaṅkhā mahāvajiraññāṇasaṅkhātā sabbaññumahā vipassanāpi ettheva saṅgahitā.
anya-e0301n1:39_6: Pahāna sampadāyameva vā sā saṅgahitāti daṭṭhabbā.
anya-e0301n1:39_7: Phalasampadā catubbidhā pahānasampadā ñāṇasampadā ānubhāvasampadā rūpakāyasampadā cāti.
anya-e0301n1:39_8: Tattha saha vāsanāya kilesappahānaṁ pahānasampadā nāma.
anya-e0301n1:41_0: Etāsu dvīsu sampadāsu ñāṇasampadā pathamaṁ vuttā,
anya-e0301n1:43_0: ‘‘Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānaṁ aggamaggaññāṇa’’nti ñāṇasampadāyaṁ vuttaṁ. Taṁpi na yujjati.
anya-e0301n1:44_1: Na hi maggaññāṇato aññā pahānasampadānāma atthīti.
anya-e0301n1:44_2: Yañca koci vadeyya maggaññāṇaṁ ñāṇañca hoti pahānañca.
anya-e0301n1:46_0: Ñāṇasampadāyaṁ sabbaññutaññāṇaṁ sabbapathamaṁ vattabbaṁpi na vuttaṁ. Taṁpi na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:47_0: Nanu ‘‘tammūlakāni ca dasabalādi ññāṇānī’’ti ettha ādisaddena sabbaññutaññāṇaṁpi gahitanti ce.
anya-e0301n1:48_0: Na hi appadhānaṁ sarūpato niddisitvā padhānaṁ pākaṭaṁ ādisaddena gahitanti ñāyāgataṁ hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:48_1: Acinteyyānubhāvehi sīlā diguṇehi iddhi dhammehi ca sampadā ānubhāvasampadā.
anya-e0301n1:48_5: Ajjhāsayassa uḷāratā kāyavacīpayogassa ca parisuddhatāti attho.
anya-e0301n1:48_6: Tattha devadattādīsu virodhisattesupi niccaṁ hitajjhāsayatā āsaya sampadā.
anya-e0301n1:48_7: Loke abhiññātānaṁ rājūnaṁ rājamahāmattānaṁ seṭṭhi gahapatīnaṁ devarājūnampi dhammaṁ desentassa lābhasakkārādi
anya-e0301n1:48_10: Dvīhi ānu bhāvarūpakāyasampadāhi saha dve sattupakārasampadā atulapadena.
anya-e0301n1:48_11: Hetusampadā pana dvīhipi padehi sāmatthiyato vibhāvitā.
anya-e0301n1:48_12: Na hi tādisiyā hetusampadāya vinā itarāsaṁ pavatti atthīti. [Sampadā]
anya-e0301n1:49_1: Punapi thero attano vandanaṁ balavataraṁ karonto sasaddhammagaṇuttamanti āha.
anya-e0301n1:49_4: sasaṅghaṁ lokanāyakanti hi vutte saṅghassapi namanakriyāpatti sahasaddena viññāyati.
anya-e0301n1:51_0: ‘‘Guṇībhūtānaṁpi hi dhammasaṅghānaṁ abhivādetabba bhāvo sahayogena viññāyatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:51_3: Evañhi sati idha adhippetassa kriyā samavāyassa siddhattā dhammasaṅghānaṁpi therassa vandanā kriyāpatti siddhā hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:51_4: Itarathā tabbapaccayassa arahatthadīpanato abhivādanā rahatā saṅkhāta guṇasamavāyo vutto siyā.
anya-e0301n1:51_6: Attano nidassanena ca saha na sameti saputtadāro āgatoti.
anya-e0301n1:52_0: Apica thero imaṁ ganthaṁ racayissāmīti pubbabhāgeyeva tīṇi ratanāni vandi,
anya-e0301n1:52_1: atha taṁ attano vandanaṁ ganthappaṭiññāya saha ghaṭetvā dassento imaṁ gāthaṁ racayītipi na na sakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n1:52_5: Tattha saddhammena ca gaṇuttamena ca attanā nimmitena sakalalokassa saraṇabhūtena saha vattatīti sasaddhamma gaṇuttamo.
anya-e0301n1:52_7: Na hi paranimmitena saddhammena gaṇuttamena ca sahitā sāvakā sasaddhammāti ca sagaṇuttamāti ca vuccanti.
anya-e0301n1:52_8: Na ca attanoeva saraṇabhūtena saddhammena sabrahmacārigaṇuttamena ca sahitā paccekabuddhā tathā thomanaṁ arahantīti,
anya-e0301n1:52_9: tasmā idaṁpi satthu asādhāraṇaguṇapadameva hotīti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:53_3: Dhammo have rakkhati dhammacārinti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:53_7: yesaṁ vasena sattā apāyesuvā vaṭṭadukkhesuvā patanti,
anya-e0301n1:53_9: Imasmiṁ atthe cattāro ariyamaggā nibbānañca nippariyāyato dhammonāma.
anya-e0301n1:53_10: Ariyamaggā hi kilese samucchindantā nibbānena saheva hutvā samucchindanti.
anya-e0301n1:53_19: Yo hi dhārentaṁ ekantena dukkhato moceti.
anya-e0301n1:53_24: Tehi keci bhāvanā vasena keci sacchikiriyavasena keci diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāravasena keci uggaha dhāraṇavasena dhārīyanti.
anya-e0301n1:53_25: Te ca evaṁ dhārīyamānā dhārentaṁ yathārahaṁ apāyadukkhato vaṭṭadukkhatoca mocenti,
anya-e0301n1:53_27: Dhārentivā sappurisājanā apāyesu vaṭṭadukkhesuca attānaṁ apata mānaṁ vahanti etenāti dhammo.
anya-e0301n1:53_28: Dharantivā ettha dhammadīpā dhammappaṭisaraṇā janā laddhappatiṭṭhā hontīti dhammotipi yujjatiyeva.
anya-e0301n1:53_30: Nanu paṭipattidhammena saha ekādasavidhova vattabboti. Saccaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:53_31: Sopana paṭipattidhammo maggassa pubbabhāgappaṭipadāeva hotīti pubbacetanā viya dāne magge eva so saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n1:53_32: Tasmā dhammo dasavidhova sabbattha vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n1:54_2: Tadaggena pariyattidhārakopi saṅghe vandaneyye saṅgahitoti yutto.
anya-e0301n1:54_4: Tadaggena tassa kalyāṇahetubhūto paṭipatti dhammopi dhamme vandaneyye saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n1:54_5: So hi puthujjanabhūtopi yehi dhammehi samannāgatattā sekhe sotāpatti phalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanne saṅgahito.
anya-e0301n1:54_6: Te pana dhammā sekkhe sotāpattimagge asaṅgahitāti nasakkā vattunti.
anya-e0301n1:54_7: Ettāvatā ye vadanti saṅghaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmīti,
anya-e0301n1:54_9: Na hi taṁsaraṇaṁ gacchantassa saraṇagamanaṁ sampajjatīti.
anya-e0301n1:54_12: yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññatto,
anya-e0301n1:54_13: so vo mamaccayena satthāti evaṁ satthuṭhāne thapetvā bhagavatā saṁvaṇṇito pariyattidhammo dhammasaraṇe saṅgahitoti yutto,
anya-e0301n1:54_19: Satthārā ca anekesu suttasahassesu so garahito.
anya-e0301n1:55_1: Samitakilesānaṁ tatoyeva pasatthānaṁ pūjitānaṁ sappurisānaṁ paṇḍitānañca dhammoti attho.
anya-e0301n1:55_3: sopi ekantena santoyeva hotīti santo dhammotipi saddhammo.
anya-e0301n1:55_4: Pasattho pūjito dhammoti attho. Sacco vā.
anya-e0301n1:55_6: So hi ayaṁ me hitoti dhārentassa ahitoyeva sampajjati.
anya-e0301n1:55_9: Gaṇuttamapade loke samāna diṭṭhisīlānaṁ sahadhammikānaṁ samūho gaṇoti vuccati.
anya-e0301n1:55_10: Idha pana uttamehi sīlādiguṇehi yutto bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho uttamoca so gaṇocāti atthena uttamagaṇonāma.
anya-e0301n1:55_11: Soyeva idha gaṇuttamoti vuccati yathā muniseṭṭho munivaroti.
anya-e0301n1:57_0: ‘‘Gaṇānaṁ gaṇesuvā devamanussādisamūhesu uttamo gaṇuttamo’’ti ca vuttaṁ. Taṁ na sundaraṁ.
anya-e0301n1:58_0: Etasmiñhi atthe sati uttamasaddo padhānabhūto hoti.
anya-e0301n1:58_1: Soca guṇamhiyeva pavattatīti tena idha ariyasaṅgho vuttoti nasijjhatīti.
anya-e0301n1:58_5: Tattha samaggena saṅghena kataṁ upasampadākammaṁ sammutināma.
anya-e0301n1:58_6: Tāya sammutiyā upasampannabhūmiṁ patvā ṭhito bhikkhusaṅgho sammutisaṅghonāma.
anya-e0301n1:58_10: Tathāpi saraṇagamana vandanā māna pūjāsakkārānussatiṭṭhānesu anuttara puññakkhetta vise sapariggahatthaṁ
anya-e0301n1:58_11: bhagavatā tathā tathā saṁvaṇṇetvā so visuṁ vuttoti daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0301n1:58_12: Puthujjanasaṅghohi puññakkhettaṁ samānopi anuttaraṁ puññakkhettaṁ nahoti. Kasmā.
anya-e0301n1:58_13: Sālikkhette tiṇānaṁ viya khettaduṭṭhānaṁ sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchānusayānaṁ sabbhāvāti.
anya-e0301n1:58_14: Puññakkhettabhāvo panassa purime saddhammapade vuttanayena veditabboti.
anya-e0301n1:59_1: Ettha ca ayaṁ loke sīlādiguṇayutto seṭṭho vandaneyyoti evaṁ seṭṭha cittaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā vandanto visesato vandatīti vuccati.
anya-e0301n1:60_0: Tisso imā bhikkhave vandanā, katamā tisso. Kāyena vandati, vācāya vandati, manasā vandatīti.
anya-e0301n1:61_0: Tattha seṭṭhacittaṁ paccupaṭṭhāpetvā jāṇudvaya kapparadvaya nalāṭa saṅkhātāni pañca aṅgāni bhūmiyaṁ patiṭṭhāpetvā
anya-e0301n1:61_2: Yaṁ sandhāya pañcappatiṭṭhitena vanditvāti tattha tattha vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:61_10: Guṇapadāni anugantvā guṇe anussaranto manasā vandatināmāti.
anya-e0301n1:62_1: Kāmañca thero imaṁ saṅgahaṁ racayanto potthakāruḷhaṁ katvāva racayissati.
anya-e0301n1:62_2: Ganthakammaṁ nāma vācākammesu pasiddhanti katvā bhāsissanti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:63_2: Saṅgayhantitica therena saṁkhipitvā gayhanti kathīyantīti attho.
anya-e0301n1:63_3: Abhidhammeti cettha abhiatireko abhivise soca dhammo abhidhammo.
anya-e0301n1:63_4: Dhammoti ca vinayapāḷito aññaṁpāḷi dvayaṁ vuccati.
anya-e0301n1:63_5: Yo vo ānanda mayā dhammoca vinayoca desito paññattoti hi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:63_6: Tañca pāḷidvayaṁ āṇāvidhānasaṅkhātaṁ vinayana kiccaṁ vajjetvā kusalādike yathāpavatte paramatthadhamme eva dīpetīti.
anya-e0301n1:63_7: Evaṁ dīpentesuca tesu dvīsu dhammesu yo itarato atirekoca hoti visesoca.
anya-e0301n1:63_10: Evañca katvā dhammo abhidhammo vinayo abhivinayoti idaṁ catukkaṁ veditabbaṁ.
anya-e0301n1:63_15: Atirekavisesatā cettha kusalādi vasena khandhādivasena saṅgahādivasena tathā tathā desetabbappakārānaṁ
anya-e0301n1:63_17: Yato sabbaññubuddhā imaṁ abhidhammadesanaṁ devesueva desenti.
anya-e0301n1:63_18: Na hi manussā evarūpaṁ tayo māse nirantaraṁ pavattanayogyaṁ kathāmaggaṁ ekena iriyāpathena ādito paṭṭhāya pariyosānaṁ pāpetvā paṭiggahetuṁ sakkonti,
anya-e0301n1:63_19: naca eva rūpo ekamātikānubandho kathāmaggo nānākhaṇesu nānājanānaṁ desetuṁ sakkuṇeyyo hotīti.
anya-e0301n1:63_22: Tattha hi dhammanāmikānaṁ dvinnaṁ pāḷīnaṁ majjheeva ayaṁ atirekavisesatā vicāritā.
anya-e0301n1:63_23: Naca yujjati vinayena saha tathā vicāretuṁ asamānakiccavisayattā.
anya-e0301n1:63_27: Kecipana vadanti evaṁ santepi vinayo eva sabbajeṭṭhako siyā.
anya-e0301n1:63_33: Tattha vinayaṁ vivaṇṇento satthu āṇācakke pahāraṁ deti.
anya-e0301n1:63_36: tassa dhammasaṅghesu tīsu sikkhāsuca agāravo siddho hoti.
anya-e0301n1:63_37: Tasmā vinaya vivaṇṇane āpatti mahantī hoti.
anya-e0301n1:63_41: Tasmā sāsanassa ciraṭṭhitatthaṁpi vinayavivaṇṇane mahatī āpatti paññattāti.
